name: Snake Survivors
description:
A small Vampire Survivors inspired version of snake created for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023 (https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2023). 

Snake Survivors can be run natively or played on the web over at https://msilycanthropy.github.io/PuzzleSnake/

Written entirely in Rust using the Bevy game engine.  Because.. why not? 

Assets from the following people over on OpenGameArt

SketchyLogic - https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles

nene - https://opengameart org/content/leap-8bit

DragonDePlatino - https://opengameart.org/content/dawnlike-16x16-universal-rogue-like-tileset-v181

p0ss - https://opengameart.org/content/spell-sounds-starter-pack

Jute - https://opengameart.org/content/items-door-fire-weapon-hits
